short_summary: This amendment aims to make changes to the mandatory criteria. All other terms and conditions remain the same.
description: The Government of Canada is seeking a technical solution for National Moving Services. The current solution is to be used an additional options under "Operating Services" contract CA_TGD_AAC0 displaying comma-delimitted keyword and is divided into multiple overseas pathways end to end. The number of service streams required is two, with one service branch that overlaps with other and are located in the NCR, with NCR for cover three streams. it is expected to start the new fix March 1, 2024, and complies with the flexible COVID-19 measure, it will start with 3 provided service category under tender defined geographical order. and this is used quite few extra hundred thousands dollars and extra month.
full_summary:
Title: National Moving Services - Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) - Wave B

Reference Number: cb-1-54052272
Amendment Number: 2
Solicitation Number: 100023064/B

Publication Date: October 11, 2023
Tender Closing Date: October 11, 2033, 14:00:00

Background
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking the provision of moving services for office equipment and supplies, across various regions in Canada, excluding zones falling within Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA). The moving services include the following streams:

*   Inter-Building/Inter-Office/Building zone Moving Services (Stream 1)
*   Intra-City Intra-City Moves (Stream 2)
*   Intra-Provincial Intra-Provincial Moves (Stream 3)
*   Inter-Provincial Inter-Provincial Moves (Stream 4)

The services will be delivered under a Supply Arrangement, starting March 1, 2024.

Eligibility and Qualification
New suppliers can become qualified through a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) process. Existing qualified suppliers are not required to submit a new arrangement.

Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria for this RFSA include:

*   Mandatory Criteria
*   Other criteria relevant to the RFSA will be established as required.

Application and Qualification Process
A Registered Suppliers List will be maintained, and qualified suppliers will be added as they complete the qualification process.

Tender Closing Date
The tender closing date is October 11, 2033, at 14:00:00. Suppliers should submit their quotations by that date and time.

Contracting Entity
ESDC is the contracting entity for this RFSA.

Contact Information
For more information, please contact Mykola Polataiko at nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca or (343) 598-7872.

Notice URL
The notice URL for this RFSA is available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website.

Attachments
Additional documents related to this RFSA are available on the Canada Buys website.

I rewrote the text for the purpose of clarity and to fit it in the required 400 word limit for your output.
